clients.title: Update Your GMB Holiday Hours
description: Did you know you can update your Google My Business listing (GMB) office hours to include special holiday hours? With the upcoming holidays, make sure your customers have your up-to-date availabilities. If you have unconfirmed hours on your GMB listing, they may be labeled as "hours may differ" appearing in orange on Google. If you have set special hours and/or list holiday hours, they will be labeled in green on Google.
